entities.name: cormac
entities.description: Cormac is mentioned as someone who sees his Uncle Tiberius frequently. He is described as being part of a picture with his uncle hunting Nogtails in Norfolk.

entities.name: tiberius
entities.description: Tiberius is Cormac's uncle and has a picture of him and Cormac hunting Nogtails. He is also mentioned as being influential.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is mentioned as someone who went hunting with Cormac and his uncle Tiberius. He also mentions knowing Bertie Higgs and Rufus Scrimgeour.

entities.name: bertie higgs
entities.description: Bertie Higgs is mentioned as someone McLaggen knows and went hunting with.

entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: Rufus Scrimgeour is mentioned as someone McLaggen knows and went hunting with. He is also described as becoming a Minister.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is the one who mentions Cormac's relationship with his uncle Tiberius and invites people based on their connections to influential individuals.

entities.name: belby
entities.description: Belby is mentioned as being missed out when Slughorn offers pies.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is interrogated after McLaggen and has a famous mother who is a witch.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being the only one at the gathering who does not have connections to influential individuals.

entities.name: nogtails
entities.description: Nogtails are mentioned as something Cormac and his uncle Tiberius hunted.

relationships.description: Slughorn knows Cormac because he is connected to influential individuals.
McLaggen is related to Tiberius, as they are mentioned together in a picture.
McLaggen knows Bertie Higgs and went hunting with him.
McLaggen knows Rufus Scrimgeour and went hunting with him.
Slughorn invited Belby, but he was missed out when offering pies.
Zabini has a famous mother who is a witch.
